column2: #prep for merge, make sure columns have same class
group_by(`WM Week`, `Brand Desc`, `Vendor Stk Nbr`, `Item Nbr`, `Item Flags`, `UPC`)%>%
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'WM Week', 'Brand Desc', 'Vendor Stk Nbr', 'Item Nbr', 'Item Flags'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
